languages.text: {n}Оборванец закрывает лицо руками и содрогается в беззвучных рыданиях.{/n} "Даф-фно... пора".

traits.locale_text: {n}Оборванец закрывает лицо руками и содрогается в беззвучных рыданиях.{/n} "Даф-фно... пора".

languages.text: {n}The man covers his face with his hands and shakes with soundless sobs.{/n} "Past t-t-time."

languages.text: {n}老人用手捂住了脸，颤抖着，发出了无声的啜泣。{/n}“已经……晚了……”
languages.original_text: {n}The man covers his face with his hands and shakes with soundless sobs.{/n} "Past t-t-time."

languages.text: {n}El hombre cubre su rostro con las manos y tiembla con unos sollozos silenciosos.{/n} «P-p-pasado».
languages.original_text: {n}The man covers his face with his hands and shakes with soundless sobs.{/n} "Past t-t-time."

languages.text: {n}老人は両手で顔を覆うと、声を殺してすすり泣く。{/n}「じ、じ、じかん、すぎれば」
languages.original_text: {n}The man covers his face with his hands and shakes with soundless sobs.{/n} "Past t-t-time."

languages.text: {n}Secoué de sanglots silencieux, l'homme se couvre le visage des deux mains.{/n} « Il serait t-temps... »
languages.original_text: {n}The man covers his face with his hands and shakes with soundless sobs.{/n} "Past t-t-time."

languages.text: {n}Der Mann bedeckt verzweifelt das Gesicht mit den Händen und schluchzt zitternd und geräuschlos.{/n} "Zu s-s-spät."

languages.text: {n}Adam, elleriyle yüzünü kapatıp sessizce ağlayarak titriyor.{/n} "Vakti g... G... Gelmişti."
